policy: GCP IAM user has service account privileges
rule: $.data[*].google_iam_policy[*].*[*].binding[?( @.role=='roles/iam.serviceAccountUser' || @.role=='roles/iam.serviceAccountActor' || @.role=='roles/iam.serviceAccountTokenCreator' )].member startsWith "user:"  or  $.resource[*].google_organization_iam_binding[*].binding[?( @.role=='roles/iam.serviceAccountUser' || @.role=='roles/iam.serviceAccountActor' || @.role=='roles/iam.serviceAccountTokenCreator' )].member startsWith "user:" or $.resource[*].google_organization_iam_member[*].binding[?( @.role=='roles/iam.serviceAccountUser' || @.role=='roles/iam.serviceAccountActor' || @.role=='roles/iam.serviceAccountTokenCreator' )].member startsWith "user:" or $.resource[*].google_project_iam_binding[*].*[?( @.role=='roles/iam.serviceAccountUser' || @.role=='roles/iam.serviceAccountActor' || @.role=='roles/iam.serviceAccountTokenCreator' )].member startsWith "user:"  or $.resource[*].google_project_iam_member[*].*[?( @.role=='roles/iam.serviceAccountUser' || @.role=='roles/iam.serviceAccountActor' || @.role=='roles/iam.serviceAccountTokenCreator' )].member startsWith "user:"
